channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4880] Education Award - Postal code verification message
item.description:
Issue
If on the form a wrong postal code is entered, the property-key is displayed instead of the error-message.

Action
Correct error-message should be shown.
item.summary: Education Award - Postal code verification message

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Hi Rafael,

The problem has been fixed and will be available in the next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4872] Search - Filters not working on Tablets
item.description:
Issue
Some of our fieldsales use iPads to present company and our new web to customers. When the first filter-attribute is selected, it starts to load forever.
I could recreate this issue in Chrome with device-emulation of an iPad.

Actions
Please investigate the issue & fix it - Filtering needs to work on Tablets.

Requestor: Vaisvila, Tomas / Thomas, Frederik
item.summary: Search - Filters not working on Tablets

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: @Jan: Can you have look in that?

The Problem was our selectbox JS Plugin, which only gets initialized, if the page was not called from a touch device. But some methods for refreshing this plugin were called no matter if the plugin was loaded or not. that leaded to javascript exceptions.

I adjusted it at all the places, where it happened:

  • Additional Facet Dropdown
  • Lightbox Return Request Dropdowns
  • Lightbox Shop Settings Dropdowns
  • Productlist Order Dropdown at Shopping and Favorite Lists
  • Shoppinglist Bulk Actions Dropdown
  • Checkout Open Order Dropdowns
  • Open Order Lightbox Dropdowns

I couldn't test the two open order regarding spots, but since Open Order is an r3 feature anyway, it should be ok.
Can be tested after next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4867] Technical View: Show More in Manufacturer Store always loads list in normal view
item.description:
Open a manufacturers store product list, e.g. fluke
http://test.distrelec.ch/manufacturer/fluke

Switch to the technical view

Click on "Show More"

=> The additionaly loaded results area always in normal view.
=> This issue does not occur on other product lists (search & category)
item.summary: Technical View: Show More in Manufacturer Store always loads list in normal view

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: fixed. Can be tested after next deployment.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Hi Florian,
could you please provide the translation in LT?
Thanks!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4775] Family view test results
item.description:
Input from tester:
Als erstes habe ich einige nicht funktionierende Family Views gefunden, z.B. hier: http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/Werkzeuge/Handwerkzeuge/Werkzeugaufbewahrung/Werkzeugtaschen-und--koffer-Plano/Werkzeugtaschen/c/cat-169265

Klickt man auf die verschiedenen Produkte (btw alle allein in den Familien im PIM, so erhält man entweder eine 404-Page oder eine „Familienansicht“ mit verschiedenen Herstellern/Produkten gemischt. Ich habe hierzu die Theorie, dass es nicht funktioniert, da verschiedene Produktfamilien denselben Namen haben (z.B. 3x Rollen-Werkzeugkoffer). Raphael hat mir mal gesagt, dass er einen Lookup mit den Namen macht, um die Produktfamilie zu definieren. Wenn die jetzt alle gleich heissen, wird das vermutlich nicht funktionieren. Dies nur so als Idee.

Ausserdem gibt es einige 404-Fehler, wenn man auf den Link klickt, wie etwa hier:
http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Netzteile-%26-Licht/Transformatoren/Leiterplattentransformatoren/Leiterplattentransformatoren%2C-nicht-kurzschlussfest/c/it.productFamilyUrl
http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Computer-%26-Hobby/Freizeit-und-Hobby/Sicherheit-%C3%9Cberwachung/c/it.productFamilyUrl

Letzteres kommt von hier: http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Computer-%26-Hobby/Freizeit-und-Hobby/Sicherheit-%C3%9Cberwachung/c/cat-L3D_542673?q=*&filter_Buyable=1 (die untersten Produkte, Starter kit dLAN). Interessant ist, dass man nach einer 404 keine weiteren Produkte mehr nachladen kann, bis man die Seite nicht neu lädt.

Was mir ebenfalls aufgefallen ist: Klicke ich auf die Familienansicht aus einer höheren Suchebene und lösche ich danach den Filter der Family wieder, lande ich nicht an dem Ort, wo ich angefangen habe (also in der höheren Suchebene), sondern auf der nächsthöheren Kategorie-Ebene (siehe Screenshots). Das finde ich etwas unglücklich, da dies den Kunden verwirrt und nicht dem erwarteten Verhalten einer Website entspricht. Kann man das noch irgendwie anpassen?

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Behauptung 1 stimmt nicht! der Link http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Werkzeuge-%26-Messtechnik/Werkzeuge/Handwerkzeuge/Werkzeugaufbewahrung/Werkzeugtaschen-und--koffer-Plano/Werkzeugtaschen/c/cat-169265 funktioniert tadellos.

Behauptung 2 stimmt auch nicht. Der Lookup wir anhand des Category-Codes gemacht und ist damit eindeutig. Der 404 stimmt. Das war ein Fehler im JavaScript. Ist mit dem nächsten Deployment behoben.

Behauptung 3 stimmt. Ich kann auch keine Produkte mehr nachladen nach einem 404. Die Frage ist ob wir dem nach gehen sollen, da es nach dem fix von oben nicht mehr dazu kommen sollte.

Behauptung 4 weiss ich nicht ob ich die richtig verstanden habe. Fakt ist aber, dass bei einem entfernen eines Kategorie-Filters die Seite nicht komplett neu geladen wird. Dies führt dazu, dass das Produktresultat zwar neu geladen wird und die Produkte der darüberliegenden Kategorie anzeigt, was korrekt ist, aber als ausserhalb wird nicht aktualisiert. Das heisst der Breadcrumb wie auch der Kategorie-Titel bleiben bestehen. Erwartetes Verhalten wäre, dass beim Entfernen eines Kategorie-Filters die Seite komplett neu geladen wird und nur beim entfernen anderer Filter die Seite per AJAX aktualisiert wird. Dies muss mit Jan Widmer besprochen und geprüft werden, ob das so ohne weiteres geht.

Noch ein „Finding“ zu der Familienansicht: Manche sind nicht via Suchresultatliste erreichbar (404), aber dafür via Produktdetailseite. Dies ist der Fall, wenn es mehrere Familien mit demselben Namen gibt. Mit dem Einstieg via Produktdetail werden diese Familien dann auch zusammengenommen, was leider nicht soo dolle Resultate erzielt. Siehe hier:

(http://test.distrelec.ch/search?q=leistungstransistoren  Produkt 612114  http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Aktive-Bauelemente/Diskrete-Halbleiter-R%C3%B6hren/Leistungstransistoren/Leistungstransistoren/Leistungstransistoren/c/cat-DC-2406 (3x Family Name „Leistungstransistor“)

Did a test on Q: Looks mostly ok.
However, if family view is called from a filtered search result list, the applied filters stay (but should not): DISTRELEC-4866

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4528] User segmentation and Newsletter settings are buggy (not modifiable) - distrelec.lt
item.description:
A registered B2B user cannot change his email settings and segmentation. The only possibility is to change the subscription/unsubscription and in some cases it even gives a 500Error

https://www.distrelec.lt/my-account/update-newsletter
https://www.distrelec.lt/my-account/login-data
item.summary: User segmentation and Newsletter settings are buggy (not modifiable) - distrelec.lt

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: https://www.distrelec.lt/my-account/login-data
www.distrelec.lt/my-account/update-newsletter

could you please mention by when this issue can be solved?

thank you

Hi Angel,

Can you provide us the user credential for which you found the setting buggy.
will be helpful to figure out the specific case.

Thanks
Neeraj

?Hi Neeraj,

it happens with all new-platforms... If a user is registered. Let me check for the specifics and get back to you.

To reproduce the issue, you might create a new user and subscribe to the newsletter in the register process. After you’ve done so, if you try to change your segmentation (newsletter) preferences it will be impossible for you…

Best regards

Angel Munoz
Senior Search Marketing Specialist

Hi Angel Munoz,

It's ready for testing once again. Please follow all the steps as you have already mentioned before, i.e. :-

  • Register a new user
  • Subscribe for newsletter subscription
  • Please activate the user by clicking the confirmation email
  • Try to edit the news letter sections

Please let me know if find any issue in any of these steps.
I confirm. tested and works.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4463] Products missing in FF
item.description:
Hi guys

As already partly reported in the Distrelec Jira and mentioned several times, we seem to miss products in FACT-Finder.

They seem to be in Hybris, as the can be accessed via direct link & navigation. In the search, however, they are not (http://www.distrelec.ch/de/USB-AC-Adapter-230-V-schwarz-Maxxtro-MX-T07U/p/16901082 vs. http://www.distrelec.ch/search?q=16901082).

So far, we are aware of the following articles:

849808 (CH, AT not found at all – no suppress PIM)
890693 (AT, CH, IT)
950852 (CH & IT)
893431 (AT, IT not found at all – no suppress PIM)
891188 (IT, AT)

But I fear the list might be longer.

Can you please have a look into that? It’s been almost - and in the case of Austria more than - two weeks that these products cannot be found via search, even if we sell them. So a fast action is very much appreciated.

DISTSEARCH-60

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Another of these products found: http://www.distrelec.it/it/Spinotto-laboratorio-%C3%B8-4-mm-Multi-Contact-LS-4/p/14048007
And another one found in LT - for sure not the only one: 818333 / http://www.distrelec.lt/lt/Capacitor%2C-SMD-100-uF-16-VDC-Suncon-16CE100AX/p/16713325
any News on this? Country Manager from Lithuania is asking for the Status of this.

849808 (CH, AT not found at all – no suppress PIM) --> found
890693 (AT, CH, IT) --> punched out for CH, not found in AT & IT
950852 (CH & IT) --> found
893431 (AT, IT not found at all – no suppress PIM) --> punched out for CH, not found AT & IT
891188 (IT, AT) --> punched out for CH, not found AT & IT

It seems that if one punchout is available it gets punched out for all countries and not just for the punched out one. I have to check that!
There was an error in the export script. Products got maybe suppressed that actually should not, but it was not related to the punchout filters. The bug will be fixed with the next release.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4927] Webtrekk script requested from wrong domain
item.description:
Accidentally I saw that the webtrekk JavaScript is requested from the wrong domain. In http://test.distrelec.nl there is the following code...

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://test.distrelec.de/medias/sys_master/h40/hbf/8909366493214/webtrekk_test_v3.js?46730293"></script>
item.summary: Webtrekk script requested from wrong domain

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4887] Expanding the categories in search does not work
item.description:
Search for example for "led". Click on the manufacturer "Avago" and try than expand the categories. In Chrome the page gets loaded newly, but the categories are not expanded, you have to click a second time.
In IE you get redirected to the homepage, what definitely should not be the case.
item.summary: Expanding the categories in search does not work

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Fixed, event handler was not attached anymore after facet ajax loading
@Jan: Now it works in Chrome, but in IE I can click on the expanding tab, but nothing happens... Can you check that again or I'm doing something wrong?
@Raphi, which IE do you use?

Are you sure that your codebase is up to date? I just tested it again in IE11 and it seems to be working. You are talking about clicking on the show more button at the category nav, right?
The Button text was still showing the "closed" text, i adjusted that also. Could you please update and try again? Thanks
The show more button now only gets displayed if there are actually more than 2 categories.
I have updated my sources but the "show more" button is still displayed even if there are just 2 categories.
works

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4866] Family View: If filter was applied before opening family view, selected filters stay
item.description:
Search for e.g. "soldering"
drill down a few categories

=> http://test.distrelec.ch/search?q=soldering&filter_Category3=Soldering+Accessories+and+Replacement+Parts&filter_Category4=Desoldering+tips

Apply manufacturer filter "weller" and tip width "1 mm"

Click on "Family" on one of the products

=> The family view opens.
=> However, the filters stay applied
=> Expected behavior: The family is always without any activated filters (as though it was opened form a product detail page)
item.summary: Family View: If filter was applied before opening family view, selected filters stay

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
This is not true. If I do not provide the before selected filters to the family view, you can not go back to the search result from before.
So we have to decide, how the process flow should be. I can open the family view without any filters, but your not able to go back to the search result, except your using the browser back button. So what should be the way to go?
Decision: The family page should not have any defined filters.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4852] Search - Availability issue
item.description:
Issue
24h availability is not shown in the filters but items with 24h availability are in the results. See screenshot.

Todo
Please investigte the issue and provide a fix. Thanks!

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: The reason is, that the index has not yet received the new stock information. In the export logic I have not found a bug, this should fit. So we have to wait until the next export is done.
Please test.
Issue still persists, see screenshot.
Now only 24h availability is shown. And if filter "FireWire: 1x ext." is applied, availability-filter is removed at all.

The issue here is, that these products got an update today around lunch time, but the export has been finished in the morning.
So the stock has changed from available in 24h to available in 7d, but FF has still the old value.
This is something we can not fix, except we would implement some update logic, but this is not in scope at the moment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4371] Zero result page adjustment
item.description:
As discussed in the end of February, we need to get a different zero result page. Still, no changes happened.

The structure should be as follows:

• Title as today (No results found…)
• A subtitle/descriptive line with tips for searching
• The search box once again, with different CTA text in it (if possible)
• A subtitle as introduction for the feedback form
• The feedback form, sending requests to the customer service of the respective country

There is a rough draft attached to get an idea how we would like to have it.

(DISTSEARCH-68 http://198.18.7.87/browse/DISTSEARCH-68?filter=-2)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Attached the translations for the modification of the page.

Hi Daniela,

There are one question and one assumption on this task, which I want to ask you :-
1. The search box on the gui in the canter air is just a text input box not like the full functional search box like we have on the top left side which has suggestion feature and all.
2. Suggestion or recommendation box on the bottom
a. What will be the criteria for making suggestion ?
Because the name of the product or search team for which the such was done was wrong that's why he landed on this page.
3. Text just bellow the red light colour Starting with Tipp: will it be change time and again for example via cms

Hi Neeraj

1. What do you mean with "just text input"? That the suggest is not popping up? If yes, it would be great if at least the query suggest could be activated in this box.
2. The suggestions will be campaigns out of FACT-Finder with some hand-picked products or some business rules (e.g. selection of new products, etc). So they do not have to be connected to the search term, but they should be maintained via campaigns or CMS.
3. The Tipp is currently not meant to change.

Does this answer your questions?

Hi Daniela,

Yes. We have started the development now.

Hi Florian,

The development has been done on this task. But we need support from some frontend engginer so that he can arrange the zero result page with the mock attached with the task.

Can you assign it to some front end engginer and let him to adjust the page looks like mock or I can explain it to him.

Thanks
The name of the page is called searchEmptyPage.jsp which needs to be adjusted.

Front end work done.
Thanks
Ruben

Hi Ruben,
Could you please align it more to the mockup in terms of font-color and spacing. Thanks.

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment:
Benötige $

{feedbackTextTop}

in campaign-feedback.jsp als einzelne Properities, damit ich das Tracking einbauen kann. Aber es scheint, als wäre der Banner als HTML Hinterlegt -> keine einzelnen Properities möglich. Richtig?

Infos zur Banner Implementation: https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-1258

Im FACT-Finder Backend wird das komplette Markup eines Feedback-Text-Banners gepflegt.

Beispiel URL:
http://www.distrelec.ch/search?q=Telefon

Im FACT-Finder definiertes HTML:
<a href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Computer-%26-Hobby/Netzwerk-und-Telekommunikation/Mobiltelefone-Zubeh%C3%B6r/Smartphones-Mobiltelefone/c/cat-39417?q=*&filter_Category3=Mobiltelefone+%2F+Zubeh%C3%B6r&filter_Buyable=1&filter_Category4=Smartphones%2FMobiltelefone&wt_mc=ch.faf-c.de.-" title="Mobiles" ><img src="/medias/sys_master/hef/h1b/8822097149982/FF-AT-DE-feedback-mobile.png" alt="mobile"></a>

Hi Mark

Das Tracking für die Feedback Campaign (siehe DISTRELEC-2482) muss direkt in einem HTML Snippet eingebaut werden, welches auf dem Fact Finder eingespielt wird.

Das HTML Snippet welches Cornel gepostet hat muss also um Webtrekk Attribute ergänzt werden und dann von einem Software Engineer auf de Fact Finder eingespielt werden.

Please implement as specified in the attached .doc-file

Thx Mark
Estimated FE work: 1d
Attribute "name" added to the link as specified in the .doc file

Hi Ruben

Tested on http://test.distrelec.ch/search?q=usb

Please compare the attached screenshot in this regard: The name-tag seems to be populated as specified within the Browser Add-on however not in the source-code itself (indicated in red). Please verify and refactor.

Thx Mark

Hello Mark,

what I did is modifying dynamically the DOM. The page source can't be changed (is an HTML file). Because the HREF link element comes from back end, "feedbackTextTop" element:

<div class="feedbackTop">$

{feedbackTextTop}

</div>

Have you tested it with webtrekk? Probably it works fine with this DOM manipulation.
If not working, we have to go for a backend solution.

Thanks,
Ruben

Unfortunately this implementation-approach is not working. By cklicking on the according item no corresponding tracking call is fired. That is also why the event-id is not reported in Webtrekk.
Therefore please involve BE accordingly.

Thx Mark

Hello Florian,
could you please assign the ticket to the BE guys?
Thanks,
Ruben

Hi Mark,

I changed the way how the tracking is done. The trigger was the name attribute before, and maybe the Webtrekk was looking for those links, before the name attribute was set by JS, so it was probably a timing issue. Now I changed it to a clicklistener, which triggers the webtrekk call. On my local Machine, I can see the call now.

could you please retest after the next deployment.

Thanks, Jan

Hallo Jan

Ich habe eine kurze Rückfrage zu 'I changed it to a clicklistener': Erfolgt(e) diese Anpassung spezifisch für FF Feedback-Campaign oder generell? Letzteres wäre nicht gut, da dies bedeuten würde, dass sämtliche href-Element Klicks per default durch Webtrekk getriggert würden (-> Kostentreiber).

Danke! Mark

Hallo Mark,

Wir haben bei den Links immer die zwei Möglichkeiten gebaut, entweder per Name Attr. oder "Manuell" per Click listener.

Ich habe es nur Sezifisch für die FF Campaign auf Klicklistener geändert.

Gruss Jan

Hi Mark,
Please test.

Tested on http://test.distrelec.ch/search?q=usb

Upon click on the USB-banner no additional Webtrekk-request is triggered.

Please verify and refactor.

Hi Mark,

I just tested it again on my local system and it works there. After that I tested it on test.distrelec.com, and you are right, it doesn't work. After some investigation, it seems, that the JS Code for that module didn't got deployed and therefore it makes sense, that it doesn't work..
So I kindly ask you if you could try again on the test server after today's deployment?

Thanks and with best regards.
Jan

Tested on http://test.distrelec.ch/search?q=usb and http://distrelec.ch/search?q=usb. By clicking on the campaign-element so far no Webtrekk-request is triggered as specified. Please verify and refactor.

Thx Mark
